LanguageData.RWBY_Crocea_Mors_Shield.label: Crocea Mors Shield
LanguageData.RWBY_Crocea_Mors_Shield.description: Crocea Mors is Jaune Arc's signature weapon. Jaune states it was passed down from his great-great-grandfather, who used it in the Great War.
LanguageData.RWBY_Crocea_Mors_Shield.tools.0.label: side
LanguageData.RWBY_Crocea_Mors_Shield.tools.1.label: front

LanguageData.RWBY_Crocea_Mors_Sword.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.RWBY_Crocea_Mors_Sword.tools.1.label: edge

LanguageData.RWBY_Crocea_Mors_Twohander.description: Crocea Mors is Jaune Arc's signature weapon. Jaune states it was passed down from his great-great-grandfather, who used it in the Great War.
